title: ITreeControlItem.ObjectType
description: Gets the type of SOLIDWORKS object for this item in the FeatureManager design tree.
returns: Type of SOLIDWORKS object for this item in the FeatureManager design tree as defined by swTreeControlItemType_e
remarks:
Currently only
features
and
components
are supported. Null is returned for sub-components of an assembly loaded hidden with a selective open.
Use
ITreeControlItem::Object
to get the SOLIDWORKS object associated with this item.
